resources.string: The name should be min 6 characters
The password should be min 6 characters

Students are required to login with their register no and the password given to them by the university. Remember to select the \'students\' portal before pressing the login button. Once logged in, the student main page will be displayed with a navigation bar in top left corner and request outpass page loaded by default.
Fill in all the fields of the request outpass form with valid details and submit for approval. Note that outpass should be requested atleast 3 hours prior to leaving.
Shows a list of all the outpasses that have been requested by the student and their statuses. Clicking on any item will dislay the outpass.
Shows a list of all the hostel administration faculties and residential counsellors. Clicking on any item will display their contact details.
Logs out of the current session. Note that for ease of use, the session will remain logged in the device, until it is voluntarily logged out.

Faculties are required to register themselves before logging in. Select the faculty portal and then click on \'register now\' text in the login page to go to registration page. Fill in all the details. In the last field, enter the faculty registration password given to you and then click on \'register\' button.
Login with the username and password entered during registration.

Shows a list of all the pending outpasses applied by the students of the block of the RC logged in. Clicking on any list item will display the respective outpass with buttons to approve or deny the request.
Select the required block and date to view a list of all the students who have been granted outpass that day.
Select the required date to view a list of all the denied outpass requests for that day. Clicking on the list item will display the respective outpass with a button to reapprove the outpass.
Shows a list of all the hostel administration faculties and residential counsellors. Clicking on any item will display their contact details.
Shows the profile of the faculty logged in. Edit the required info and hit the button to update profile.
Logs out of the current session. Note that for ease of use, the session will remain logged in the device, until it is voluntarily logged out.
